thread.section_title: PrimeStyle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PrimeStyle | www.primestyle.com
thread.title: Mitchell Rosenberg

author: Mitchell Rosenberg
title: Mitchell Rosenberg
text: I have purchased from PrimeStyle several times in the past and always with plenty of time for whatever event I needed the item for, this time I almost missed an anniversary and they came to the absolute rescue. I was on the site and found a perfect pair of 2ct diamond earrings but needed them in only a few days. I chatted online with someone who was fantastic , handled the order, got me a discount on top of the great price and set up the fastest delivery available. The item made it here two days ahead of schedule and I was thrilled with the quality and my wife was beside herself. Great job to all at PrimeStyle.
